name: Pythagora
title: pythagora.ai
shortDescription: Pythagora acts as your AI coding partner, simplifying the process of turning ideas into fully functional software projects without the need for complex setups or dependencies. It is designed for developers and teams looking to quickly build and deploy apps with minimal coding. An example use case is a startup wanting to rapidly prototype and test new software ideas, leveraging AI to handle backend and frontend development efficiently.
pros: Integrates AI for efficient coding and debugging
Supports React for frontend and Node.js for backend
cons: Potentially high cost for premium plans
